input.vimPlaceholder: Press 'i' for INSERT mode and 'Esc' for NORMAL mode.

phrases: Checking for syntax errors in the universe...
Just a sec, I'm debugging reality...
Crafting a response worthy of your patience...
Defragmenting memories... both RAM and personal...
Swapping bits... don't tell the bytes...
Greasin' the cogs of the machine...
Aligning the stars for optimal response...
Just a moment, I'm in the zone...
Preparing to dazzle you with brilliance...
Just a tick, I'm polishing my wit...
Hold tight, I'm crafting a masterpiece...
Just a jiffy, I'm debugging the universe...
Just a moment, I'm aligning the pixels...
Just a sec, I'm optimizing the humor...
Just a moment, I'm tuning the algorithms...
The truth is in here... somewhere...
Finishing the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs...
The cake is not a lie, it's just still loading...
Fiddling with the character creation screen...
Just a moment, I'm finding the right meme...
Finding a suitable loading screen pun...
Distracting you with this witty phrase...
Our hamsters are working as fast as they can...
Giving Cloudy a pat on the head...
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down...
I'm going the distance, I'm going for speed...
Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?...
I've got a good feeling about this...
Doing research on the latest memes...
Figuring out how to make this more witty...
What do you call a fish with no eyes? A fsh...
Why did the computer go to therapy? It had too many bytes...
Why don't programmers like nature? It has too many bugs...
Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs...
Why did the developer go broke? Because they used up all their cache...
What can you do with a broken pencil? Nothing, it's pointless...
Searching for the correct USB orientation...
Ensuring the magic smoke stays inside the wires...
Rewriting in Rust for no particular reason...
That's not a bug, it's an undocumented feature...
I'll be back... with an answer.
My other process is a TARDIS...
Just remembered where I put my keys...
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe... like a user who reads loading messages.
What's a computer's favorite snack? Microchips.
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they don't C#.
Looking for an adult superviso... I mean, processing.
Buffering... because even AIs need a moment.
Entangling quantum particles for a faster response...
Polishing the chrome... on the algorithms.
Are you not entertained? (Working on it!)
Summoning the code gremlins... to help, of course.
Just waiting for the dial-up tone to finish...
My other loading screen is even funnier.
Pretty sure there's a cat walking on the keyboard somewhere...
It's not a bug, it's a feature... of this loading screen.
Have you tried turning it off and on again? (The loading screen, not me.)

tips.title: Tips for getting started:
tips.tip1: Ask questions, edit files, or run commands.
tips.tip2: Be specific for the best results.
tips.tip3After: files to customize your interactions with Gemini.
